scripts.start:all: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-golang" "npm run start-nest" "npm run start-bun"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:bun && npm run test:nest && npm run test:golang
scripts.analyze: node profiler/analyze.js profiler/results/bun-results.json profiler/results/nest-results.json profiler/results/golang-results.json profiler/results/nestBun-results.json
